title: Mission
description: Our Mission is to help young aspiring Mathletes find and pursue their love of mathematics through fun competitions against other kids with similar interests.

title: Free
description: The OYMC was designed so that students wouldn't have to face any barriers in order to attend, specifically money issues. The contest is free with no fee needed.

title: Location
description: To ensure that all kids could participate in the competition albeit their location, the OYMC is held online and students across various countries participate and compete.
